name: Prism Solutions

overview:
Prism Solutions specializes in the selection, implementation, and support of Business Management Application for mid-sized businesses that work in the area of Distribution, Manufacturing, Professional Services, Retail, Aquaculture, Entertainment and Funeral Management.

Products - Microsoft Dynamics NAV, Dynamics CRM, Dynamics POS & Dynamics Retail Management

Services - Project Management, Analysis, Design & Development, Integrations, Training, Support
